title: Ban glyphosate and protect people and the environment from toxic pesticides
commission_response_summary: Aim 1 (ban glyphosate): Rejected. Aim 2 (transparency): New Regulation adopted 2019, applicable from 27 March 2021. Aim 3 (reduction targets): Farm to Fork Strategy 2020 set 50% reduction target

title: Minority SafePack – one million signatures for diversity in Europe
commission_response_summary: Commission concluded no new legal acts would be proposed. Pointed to existing legislation as sufficient. Organizers challenged decision in court and lost in November 2022

title: One of us
commission_response_summary: Commission vetoed the initiative and did not propose legislation. Organizers filed legal challenge before the General Court

title: Stop vivisection
commission_response_summary: Commission refused to repeal Directive 2010/63/EU as requested. Committed to enhanced monitoring, supporting alternative methods, and stakeholder dialogue

title: Water and sanitation are a human right!  Water is a public good, not a commodity!
commission_response_summary: Commission proposed revision of Drinking Water Directive, which was adopted and became applicable on 27 March 2021. Represents actual new legislation

title: SAVE CRUELTY FREE COSMETICS - COMMIT TO A EUROPE WITHOUT ANIMAL TESTING
commission_response_summary: Commission committed to working on a roadmap to phase out animal testing. No immediate legislative proposal but multiple follow-up actions initiated

title: Stop Finning – Stop the trade
commission_response_summary: Commission adopted Communication on 5 July 2023 with follow-up actions. Improvements to shark trade monitoring implemented

title: Cohesion policy for the equality of the regions and sustainability of the regional cultures
commission_response_summary: Commission concluded no new legislation would be proposed. Some proposals fell outside EU competence; others already covered by existing Cohesion policy

title: Save bees and farmers ! Towards a bee-friendly agriculture for a healthy environment
commission_response_summary: Commission welcomed initiative but proposed no new legislation. Emphasized implementation of already-proposed regulations (Sustainable Use of Plant Protection Products, Nature Restoration Law)

title: Fur Free Europe
success_level: Limited - Under evaluation, no immediate legislation
commission_response_summary: Commission mandated EFSA for scientific opinion (published July 2025). Actions on welfare, health, environmental aspects, and labeling, but no immediate ban legislation

title: End the Cage Age
success_level: Positive response but delayed - Legislative proposal promised by end of 2023, not yet delivered
commission_response_summary: Commission committed to legislative proposal by end of 2023 to phase out and prohibit cages for all mentioned animals. Deadline was missed; legal action launched by organizers in March 2024
